Title: Illustrated Letter, Early Western Travelogue (Opus 7) "The Long Trail"
Medium: Pen and Ink Watercolor on Paper
Description: This is an illustrated letter by Olaf Seltzer.  The drawing depicts a train in the background that's steaming toward the foreground.  There are power lines pictured to the right side and five horses running across the train tracks, from right to left.
